name: libkrb5
desc:
Karberos was originally developed for MITs Project Athena in the
1980s and has grown to become the most widely deployed system for 
authentication and authorization in modern computer networks.

The libkrb5 package was created by Vovolinux specially for the MazonOs
distribution, in order to mett the needs of services such as smbd, nmbd
and winbindd, without the need to install the complete Kerberos program 
and its respective services.

The libraries were extracted from package krb5-1.16.1-1.mz.
